item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "Marriage, in my view, should be a balanced stalemate between equal adversaries." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "No woman really wants a man to carry her off; she only wants him to want to do it." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "I do not scruple to employ mendacity and a fictitious appearance of female incompetence when the occasion demands it." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "A short story is a different thing all together - a short story is like a kiss in the dark from a stranger." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Humor is almost always anger with its make-up on." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "It is the tale, not he who tells it." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Fault always lies in the same place: with him weak enough to lay blame." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Lucius Annaeus Seneca
item.description: "Sometimes even to live is an act of courage." -- Lucius Annaeus Seneca

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "What to do if you find yourself stuck in a crack in the ground underneath a giant boulder you can't move, with no hope of rescue. Consider how lucky you are that life has been good to you so far. Alternatively, if life hasn't been good to you so far, which given your current circumstances seems more likely, consider how lucky you are that it won't be troubling you much longer." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Sarah J. Maas
item.description: "No. I can survive well enough on my ownâ€” if given the proper reading material." -- Sarah J. Maas

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Stephen King
item.description:
"No one can tell what goes on in between the person you were and the person you become. No one can chart that blue and lonely section of hell. There are no maps of the change. You just come out the other side.
Or you don't." -- Stephen King

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Dave Pelzer
item.description: "Even in its darkest passages, the heart is unconquerable. It is important that the body survives, but it is more meaningful that the human spirit prevails." -- Dave Pelzer

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Michael Scott
item.description: "The strong survive, but the courageous triumph." -- Michael Scott

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by edwin louis cole
item.description: "You don't drown by falling in the water; you drown by staying there." -- edwin louis cole

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Robertson Davies
item.description: "Extraordinary people survive under the most terrible circumstances and they become more extraordinary because of it." -- Robertson Davies

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Carrie Ryan
item.description: "Knowing that this is what it means to live. That this love, this need is what drives us to push and fight and build and grow. That as long as there's hope and love in this world, there will always be the living." -- Carrie Ryan

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Chris Cleave
item.description: "A scar does not form on the dying. A scar means, I survived." -- Chris Cleave

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Elizabeth Scott
item.description: "The thing about hearts is that they always want to keep beating" -- Elizabeth Scott

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Carrie Ryan
item.description: "Survivors aren't always the strongest; sometimes they're the smartest, but more often simply the luckiest." -- Carrie Ryan

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by Sherman Alexie
item.description: "If one reads enough books one has a fighting chance. Or better, one's chances of survival increase with each book one reads." -- Sherman Alexie

item.title: Daviyd add a quote by David Mamet
item.description: "You know, I once read an interesting book which said that, uh, most people lost in the wilds, they, they die of shame. Yeah, see, they die of shame. 'What did I do wrong? How could I have gotten myself into this?' And so they sit there and they... die. Because they didn't do the one thing that would save their lives. Thinking." -- David Mamet
